item.title: Immigration Backlog May Hinder Trump's Deportation Plans
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump faces several hurdles with his proposal for mass deportations, including a large backlog in immigration court.

item.title: Former Rep. Kingston to Newsmax: Carter a 'Good Man' With Mixed Legacy

item.title: Rep. Lawler: Removing Speaker 'Playing With Fire'
item.description: Rep. Mike Lawler, R-N.Y., warned his colleagues about the dangers of removing House Speaker Mike Johnson, R-La.
